dmca.title: [ABUSE] Problem Domain
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, November 30, 2005 12:55 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Policy Enforcement
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Problem Domain


For your review.

Martin Gaston
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Begin forwarded message:

> From: Chris Ross <chris@constant-content.com>
> Date: November 29, 2005 4:33:19 PM CST
> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
> Subject: [ABUSE] Problem Domain
>
> Hi -
>
> We have a problem with one of the domains you host. This domain:
> http://www.pet-shop-online.co.uk/
>
> This site has stolen content from our site and any attempt to contact 
> the owner has failed. We are now contacting you the host to either 
> remove the site in question or put us in contact with the owner.
>
> http://www.pet-shop-online.co.uk/dog-grooming.php
>
> Was taken from our site here:
> http://www.constant-content.com/?area=viewdoc&id=1727
>
> Without purchasing the license. Please get back to me ASAP.
>
> --
> Thank you
> Chris Ross
> Constant Content
> http://www.constant-content.com
>
